price: (12) And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مَا تَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā wajaʿala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-anʿāmi mā tarkabūna
